about.title: Improving Our AI Models Every Single Day
about.subtitle: Startup dedicated to perfecting AI algorithms in real-time to create the most realistic fantasies on the market
about.description: We're not another static AI tool. We're a team obsessed with improving our models daily. Every generated image helps train better algorithms. Every feedback refines our systems. Today's DreamDuel AI is 10x better than 3 months ago, and in 3 months it'll be 10x better than today.

mission.title: Our Obsession: Unstoppable AI Models
mission.description: While you sleep, our servers train smarter models. Automatic weekly improvements, constantly expanding datasets, algorithms learning from millions of generations. Your fantasies don't just materialize â€“ they improve exponentially every time you use DreamDuel.

values.title: 24/7 Model Improvement
values.description: 5 machine learning engineers training models non-stop. Every Tuesday we deploy an improved version of our algorithms. +37% better visual quality vs 2 months ago. This never stops.

values.title: Constant Fine-Tuning
values.description: Every generation feeds our dataset. Already processed +500K images training better models. Your direct feedback adjusts parameters in real-time. The AI literally learns from you.

values.title: Absolute Privacy
values.description: Improved models + unbreakable encryption. Your data trains the AI anonymously. No one sees your content, but everyone benefits from smarter models. Total win-win.

values.title: Exponential Innovation
values.description: We don't just update â€“ we revolutionize. New AI architectures every quarter. What was technically impossible 6 months ago is now your daily generation. The future arrives faster here.

journey.title: From Experiment to Quality Obsession
journey.description: Started training models on home GPUs. 3 months later, 50+ GPU cluster working 24/7. Today we deploy automatic updates users don't even notice â€“ but they see 2x better results. Every investment dollar goes to improving AI models, not advertising. Because we believe the best AI sells itself.

about.ctaSubtitle: Be part of the AI revolution that's changing how we create personalized adult content

hero.title: Your Fantasies, Tangible Reality
hero.subtitle: Turn simple fantasies into visual stories with AI. Just describe people, theme, and context - AI creates the rest in 30 seconds.

ageVerification.title: Age Verification
ageVerification.message: DreamDuel materializes intense and personal fantasies with adult content. Some scenarios include themes of revenge, lust and power without censorship. You must be 18 years or older to continue.
ageVerification.disclaimer: By continuing, you confirm that you are of legal age in your jurisdiction and accept NSFW content.

features.title: Turn Fantasies into Reality with AI
features.subtitle: Minimal inputs for maximum ease - Intense personal scenarios
features.ctaQuestion: Ready to materialize your first fantasy?

items.title: No Complex Prompts
items.description: Just input: people (Ana, Pedro), theme (revenge, lust, romance) and context (office). AI automatically expands to complete story with rich scenes, detailed characters and emotional dialogues.

items.title: Instant Visual Generation
items.description: Each scene includes consistent images and subtle animations. From imagined fantasy to 5-10 visual panels with coherent characters in 30 seconds. Uncensored content for adults.

items.title: Total Privacy Guaranteed
items.description: Your most intimate fantasies remain private. End-to-end encryption and absolute control over your content. No one else sees your creations unless you decide to share.

items.title: Personalization with Real Names
items.description: Use real people's names or custom avatars for maximum immersion. Dark and intimate fantasies: revenge, lust, power. Everything you imagine, made tangible.

items.title: Export and Share
items.description: Download as PDF, short video or interactive story. Quick adjustments with buttons: 'more intense', 'anime style', 'change character'. Interactive preview before exporting.

items.title: Earn Premium by Sharing
items.description: Invite a friend and both win: you get 2 weeks of Premium free for each successful referral. Your friend receives 15% off their first subscription. Share fantasies, multiply benefits.

pricing.title: Choose Your Fantasy Plan
pricing.subtitle: Start free and unlock unlimited scenarios
pricing.guarantee: Have questions? All plans include 7-day guarantee

premium.name: Premium
features: 10 story generation credits with images per day

showcase.title: Materialized Fantasy Examples
showcase.subtitle: Discover how others have turned their intense scenarios into reality

scenarios.title: Corporate Revenge
scenarios.description: Maria entered: 'me, ex-boss, sexual revenge, corporate promotion'. DREAMDUEL generated 8 panels where she seduces and dominates her former boss, dark anime style with dialogues charged with sexual tension and power. Who's your revenge target?

scenarios.title: Lust in the Office
scenarios.description: Carlos created: 'Ana, Pedro, lust, boardroom'. In 30 seconds he got a 6-scene story with consistent images and subtle animations. Fantasy he imagined, now tangible. What scenario do you imagine?

scenarios.title: Power and Seduction
scenarios.description: Laura transformed her fantasy: 'boss, coworker, domination, corporate power'. AI automatically expanded to complete story with detailed characters. No complex prompts, just people + theme + context.

scenarios.title: Dark Romance
scenarios.description: Diego simply wrote: 'neighbor, teacher, dark romance, night neighborhood'. DREAMDUEL created 10-panel comic with deep emotional narrative. Use real or fictional names for maximum immersion.

scenarios.title: Forbidden Fantasy
scenarios.description: Sofia materialized the unimaginable: 'ex-partner, close friend, lustful revenge, reunion'. Exported as short video with quick adjustments ('more intense', 'realistic style'). Everything you imagine, uncensored.

scenarios.title: Personalized Intense Scenario
scenarios.description: Roberto used: 'work colleague, college friend, lust, business trip'. Interactive preview allowed him to adjust details before generating. Full NSFW content in Premium plan. Ready for your fantasy?

characterCarousel.subtitle: Each one waits for you... Who will you choose?

items.text: Wrote 'my boss, me, sexual revenge, office' and in 30 seconds had 8 INSANE scenes. Quality is crazy, looks like professional comic for real.
